results.definition: the act of waiting (remaining inactive in one place while expecting something)
examples: the wait was an ordeal for him

results.definition: look forward to the probable occurrence of
examples: he is waiting to be drafted

results.definition: time during which some action is awaited
serve as a waiter or waitress in a restaurant
examples: I'm waiting on tables at Maxim's

results.definition: stay in one place and anticipate or expect something
examples: I had to wait on line for an hour to get the tickets
